website_summaries.verdict: A nutritionally-balanced dry cat food by a trusted brand with flavors cats love and a lower price than many of its competitors.
pros: Offers both an exceptional value and quality ingredients
Formulated with natural fiber for indoor cats, and free of artificial flavors and preservatives
cons: A few reports of cats not being fond of it, but many more consumers say their cats love it

customer_reviews.title: Chucks favorite food.
customer_reviews.text: The only cat food Chuck our 15 lb. Maine Coon will eat. He knows when the sack is delivered, he can smell it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Lazar

customer_reviews.title: It's a great deal!!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is huge! My cat weighs 13 pounds, so naturally, my idea of 13 lbs is off. I was not expecting the bag to be this big! That's about how much I pay for a 3 lb bag at the store. I'm very happy with this purchase and my cat (Chloe) is too! :)
customer_reviews.author: Prime&Proper

customer_reviews.title: Best Large Label natural food
customer_reviews.text: Best large brand natural cat food. My 2 cats enjoy this food, I switched brands after my now aging cats weight loss had to be taken seriously. They are slimming down, my boy is still 21 pounds but his fat is becoming muscle. His sister my girl is losing her gut. Good food I don't feel guilty about feeding to my cats.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany S.

customer_reviews.title: Purina Cat Chow NATURALS
customer_reviews.text: My cats have been eating this brand for years without any problems. I have slowly tried to introduce more expensive and purer ingredients, but all 3 have digestive problems. So, if it ain't broke don't fix it!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry W.

customer_reviews.title: I took over the feeding his outside cats and they love this food
customer_reviews.text: After my former neighbor passed away, I took over the feeding his outside cats and they love this food. On a side note, squirrels do to.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda J

customer_reviews.title: My cats seem to love this food
customer_reviews.text: My cats seem to love this food. It is also fairly well priced for the quantity. My main point of concern is that one of our two cats does have especially potent feces after eating it. It is a large male cat, so I can completely believe he just has stinky poopy and I will continue to buy this cat food; his previous owner, who used a different food, complained of the same issue. Some cats just produce extra strong smelling waste, but also it could be the food (at least in part).
customer_reviews.author: Emswizzle

customer_reviews.title: Manny-approved.
customer_reviews.text: My kitty loves it and he's healthy, so nothing to complain about here. The price is good and with Prime shipping, it's so worth it to not have to haul it home from the store.
customer_reviews.author: Christine B.

customer_reviews.title: Helped my cats' tummy troubles
customer_reviews.text: Cats love it! Our two cats with sensitive tummies do very well on this food, and they like it so well I can feed it from my hand as a treat. For two years I worked with my vet, tried grain free, canned, and even raw, and nothing would help my two cats' sensitive tummies. Based on reviewers' comments, I tried this food, and it works for them. No more barfing or messy butts! Despite all the online discussion of the wonders of grain-free wet food, my cats do better on dry food with grain.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: This is the only cat food that I can get ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the only cat food that I can get my 3 cats to agree on and it doesn't cause them any dietary issues. As you can see they're all healthy weight, and shiny fur. :) When I feed them the salmon variety they tend to have issues with keeping it down, chicken no problem !
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Donnelly

customer_reviews.title: Will purchase again
customer_reviews.text: I've tried numerous types of kitten/cat food in the last month in a desperate attempt to find the "magic pill", so to speak. First food caused one kitten to have terrible diarrhea. Second food, kitten was still having diarrhea... Third food caused the kittens to both have awful "chicken farts." Fourth food was just a trial sized bag of food given to me by the shelter I adopted them from that held me over til this order arrived. Expensive food brands don't mean better. I've read that in comments and it couldn't be more true. This food will likely be what I stick to from now on. Both kittens are finally having solid bowel movements with no flatulence.
customer_reviews.author: FacemireS

customer_reviews.title: Shiney coat
customer_reviews.text: This cat food is my cats favourite. He is maintaining his weight well on this food. I do not find this food to be smelly at all. The pieces are nice and small so my kitty likes them. There are not any crazy colors to the kibbles like some other foods have. My cats cost is much softer since starting to eat this food.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda lg

customer_reviews.title: They all seem to like it. Your dog will now purr with happiness !
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 cats, and one will only eat this dry food They are all rescues. Our beautiful Brittany rescue ( a dog) also eats this quite often. She will not eat dog chow. Now she purrs and sits on top of the refrigerator. Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: Iris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this cat food. I like the fact that the first ingredient is meat and not corn.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this product with the intent of it being ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product with the intent of it being distributed by Purina but no, Please do not purchase this. I understand the price is very convenient but it is not worth the harm it will cause to your cat. The letters/numbers on the top of the bag were upside down
customer_reviews.author: LauraLaurelle

customer_reviews.title: My cats love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this stuff!!! Years ago I finally upgraded from the "McDonalds of cat food (Meow Mix)" and was buying small bags of various brands of food to see what my boys would react to since one of them is a very picky eater. Low and behold, Purina Naturals was the #1 choice! Friends have commented on how healthy & shiny their coats look and they really enjoy the taste. Couldn't be happier with this choice.
customer_reviews.author: dameow687

customer_reviews.title: Cats gave it a paws-down
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't get my cats to eat this stuff for love nor money nor furry mice. Finally donated it to a local shelter..
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: BREEDER RECOMMENDED
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased kitten. This is the food that the cat breeder recommended. He is a very large kitten and will be at least 20 pounds when he grows up. Only purchased two bags as I don't know how much he will eat yet. Will go on auto ship, which is very convenient...especially since I don't have to lift it. My home is small, so I opened the bag and and put about 6 cups each in freezer bags.....it makes my life easy
customer_reviews.author: foggy3

customer_reviews.title: Great for my elderly cat
customer_reviews.text: My three cats really like this. My oldest cat, Phantom, is 17 years old. He has Feline Wasting Disease. We did some research, then switched the cats to a combination of dry food with low carbs and added cooked chicken to increase the protein. All the cats are doing well, Phantom is maintaining his weight, his hair is growing back and he doesn't vomit when he eats. It's not a cure, but nutrition is important, especially in these elderly cats.
customer_reviews.author: Goge

customer_reviews.title: 3 Days No Cat Puke!!!  ....it's the little things.
customer_reviews.text: It's only been a few days, but that's a hell of a stretch of time to not step in a mushy, wet land mine, concocted in the churning hoark-factory that is my cat's stomach. Oh yeah... Good value, especially shipped to your door. Not a bad price to pay for what is essentially "room service" for my cats.
customer_reviews.author: Grorich

customer_reviews.title: Product EXPIRED
customer_reviews.text: After I filled our cat food container and emptied the bag, I saw that the product was over two months EXPIRED! While the cat food is probably safe for my cats to eat, I advise all buyers to use caution and check the dates on each and every bag. I will from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie P.

customer_reviews.title: Favored by Two
customer_reviews.text: I accidentally bought the 13 pound size and gave half away to another cat owner. I never thought my two cats would eat so much of it. Naturals has become their favorite dry cat food. I may reordering sooner than later!
customer_reviews.author: Chachie

customer_reviews.title: DONT PURCHASE FROM HERE - Expired food and sick cat!
customer_reviews.text: My cat who LOVES eating did not even finish half a bowl of this. He started vomiting nonstop after he had digested it. I decided to check the one-star reviews of this product afterwards and saw that people warned about expired bags. I quickly went and checked my own bag after and saw that it had expired 1/10/2018. Disgusting. No wonder my kitty avoided this like the plague after. I know the price is tempting for the amount, but the price of a sick kitty and cleaning up vomit bombs makes up the hefty difference. Buy your food elsewhere!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shane L.

customer_reviews.title: Get an excellent deal on this cat food by doing so
customer_reviews.text: I use Amazon subscription for our cat food needs. Get an excellent deal on this cat food by doing so, and never forget to get cat food banks to the ease and service . This is like the Wendy’s of cat food not quite as bad as McDonald’s not quite as great as the outback. Still our cats like it and it fits into our price range so really recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for my toothless cat
customer_reviews.text: I am a die-hard Taste of the Wild cat owner. However, my cat had to get all his teeth out. His appetite didn't diminish after the surgery but he was eating WAY less. Tried all the wet foods in the world and a couple of dry ones. Nope. This one, presumably it's the small size of the kibble, he is back to his old nomnomom self. Thanks Purina!
customer_reviews.author: M.S.H.

customer_reviews.title: Big bag, you’re gonna need a tote.
customer_reviews.text: Hooray for cat food forever. This stuff. Unless you have *all the catsTM️* you’ll want to order a container to keep this bag fresh. But it’s a great buy and even with the cost of a tote you are probably saving money. But seriously. Get a tote or barrel to store this beast in.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Jean

customer_reviews.title: Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.text: My kittie doesn't want to eat nothing else but this kind. I bought every single dry food brand and wet food out there until I got this. She saw the light! And, I was relieved becasue she had me worried not wanting to eat as she should be eating. I am glad of my purchase. I want to keep recieving this automatically and I hope it gets home well packaged and on the timeliness it did today...Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Pebbles-of-Life

customer_reviews.title: but kinda disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: My cats have been eating this cat food for a few months now. Bought this bag on here, and now all of a sudden they have majorly stinky farts and poops. Not sure why or how this bag is any different than bags in grocery stores, but kinda disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Nessalove

customer_reviews.title: Both My Cats Love It
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try to find a cat food that was healthier for my two cats than the hard food that they had been eating, so I decided to try this brand. Both of my cats absolutely love it, better than any other hard food they have tried. The only problem now is the price, when I last purchased it from Amazon it was just $11.99 for a 13 lb. bag, but the price seems to have went up since then. I guess I may have to look elsewhere to purchase it until maybe the price comes back down.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Always a hit.
customer_reviews.text: Nina doesn't throw up with this cat chow. All 4 cats love it. I used the regular natural cat chow until the last 2 cats were one year. They only ate the kitten chow for a few months. I read the back of the Purina cat chow naturals which had the vitamins for the young cats. The 2 boys are a year old and huge (part Maine Coon) and I have switched to the indoor naturals.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Anything for Daisy
customer_reviews.text: So Daisy is an outdoor cat we found and started feeding but this cat has expensive tastes. She was having the other Purina one with the blue bag and Iams but wouldn't touch the meow mix..so this was a great comprise. Got it on sale and she loves this. It's not as expensive but the quality is still there. All hail Daisy.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: My cats LOVE this!
customer_reviews.text: My cats love the change! I usually buy the regular Cat Chow Indoor, but this was on sale, so I thought I'd give it a shot! They love the it and it's beter for them. I will be purchasing this from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan & Ashley Taylor

customer_reviews.title: may not be the real deal
customer_reviews.text: i've ordered this twice, for the convenience of having it delivered to my door. i thought the formulation was different from what i purchased locally but it seemed fresh and my cat ate it. when it was temporarily unavailable on amazon, i bought a bag from tractor supply, sure enough this bag from tractor supply is the original formulation. i think i'll pass on the convenience of amazon with this item; not real comfortable giving my cat something that may not be the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: CRD

customer_reviews.title: My cats are indoors so I wanted to cut their calories and this seems to work fine.
customer_reviews.text: I've been feeding my cats this for over a year with no problems. The only time they throw it up is when they try to be pigs and eat too fast. My cats are indoors so I wanted to cut their calories and this seems to work fine.
customer_reviews.author: lib74

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: What can I say but, It's the only dry food my cat will eat! My cat his been eating Friskies dry food since he became an adult cat - many years ago. He has fewer teeth now, but he still enjoy a little extra helping of dry food mixed with his wet food. I like the convenience of leaving dry food out for him if I'm going to be out of the house for several hours. It gives him what he needs and it doesn't dry and stick to his dish.
customer_reviews.author: Dee in North Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Both of our cats enjoy it. The bag was a little bigger than ...
customer_reviews.text: Both of our cats enjoy it. The bag was a little bigger than I was expecting -- a great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Terrified!
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the package box, the bag of the purina cat chow dry cat food was open and taped. I saw spilled dry food inside the box with ants. This is terrible!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Terrified customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price. Amazon is great for those of us ...
customer_reviews.text: Huge bag. Great price. Amazon is great for those of us who have limited ability to get around and are dependent on others to take to the store. thank you.
customer_reviews.author: MKK

customer_reviews.title: Minimizing cat smells.... I could go on all day....
customer_reviews.text: Our cat never goes outside, so I have always used Indoor recipe; I do not have another food that is not indoor to compare it to. I cannot imagine not trying every avenue to keep the litter box smell at a minimum. We have this on auto delivery every two months!
customer_reviews.author: Planet Janet 61

customer_reviews.title: This food is making my cats SICK!
customer_reviews.text: We've been feeding our cats this for years and now all of a sudden they are puking and having diarrhea all over my house! I buy 4 13lb bags through Amazon Subscribe and Save every month, and I just cancelled my order for April 2018. I have 7 cats---do you know what it's like to be in a house where 7 cats are getting sick all over the place? WTH Purina? I will never purchase another Purina product again!
customer_reviews.author: Marsaili

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: My cat had been throwing up a lot, I finally realized it was the food I had been feeding her. I switched to this Purina Naturals, it's all natural ingredients and it has really helped her stomach issues. She doesn't throw up anymore unless it's to get rid of a hair ball. This is a great value as well. I always bought my cat food at wal-mart of the grocery store but this is a much better deal and it gets delivered right to your doorstep!
customer_reviews.author: Jaci Kjernander

customer_reviews.title: as much as any of us would enjoy eating our favorite food day in and day out
customer_reviews.text: My cat eats it, and likes it, as much as any of us would enjoy eating our favorite food day in and day out :-) I flavor it with a bit of canned food to give her a change. She is very healthy, so it must be pretty good stuff. It smells good to me, and I guess it does to her as well.
customer_reviews.author: Just me

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this cat food and had a great price for on Amazon Plus it came right on time when they said it was supposed to plus they have the monthly renewal process which makes it even easier thumbs up in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: Badwolf

customer_reviews.title: Three 13-lb bags of expired food
customer_reviews.text: This is the brand I regularly feed my cat, so I don't actually "hate it" as the one-star implies. It's just completely useless to me because all three bags I just ordered were about 5 months past the "best by" date. I'm not under the illusion that the food magically goes bad on that date. But I don't really know where to draw the line on what''s ok to feed to my cat and don't want to risk it. Therefore, I threw it away and got a refund. I appreciate the ease with which I got the refund through Amazon. But ordering this was a waste of my time, so I can't rate it higher than one star.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Kowalski

customer_reviews.title: Great experience all the way around! Kitties love this!
customer_reviews.text: Kitties love it! The product packaging and shipping were excellent! Thank you So much! I would highly recommend this seller! Thank you so much again !
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Sometimes

customer_reviews.title: Same awesome product that kitty loves and I don't have to ...
customer_reviews.text: Why have I been buying his at the store?! Same awesome product that kitty loves and I don't have to haul it around, this goes straight to my door!
customer_reviews.author: AlphaLeonis

customer_reviews.title: I had a cat that had allergies and the vet ...
customer_reviews.text: I had a cat that had allergies and the vet could not determine the problem. She was eating Purina One chow and I tried this in case it was food allergies and it turned out that was the case - she needed food without additives and this worked. This was on a wish list for our local humane society so I had no hesitation in buying it for their cats!
customer_reviews.author: Janet A.

customer_reviews.title: so that's good. She's not a super picky cat though
customer_reviews.text: Basic cat food. Saved me a trip to Wal-Mart right before I left for vacation, so that's an instant win. The Frog Princess Buttercup approves, so that's good. She's not a super picky cat though, so I can't speak for those who have finnicky taste buds. I do notice, however, that she eats more of this food than other foods I have gotten her. Decent cat food at my price range, 10/10 would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Niall

customer_reviews.title: Meow, Meow, Yumm.
customer_reviews.text: It was awesome purchasing this from Amazon. The price was cheaper than I could buy it locally and it was delivered right to my door. Okay that was for delivery. Now about the product. I am not sure how to review this I guess all I can say is that it has great protein, vitamins and minerals and my finicky cat loves it. I bought Natures select because I got the name wrong after a friend recommended this and my cat wouldn't touch that.
customer_reviews.author: g ed jdjdjd by f

customer_reviews.title: decent
customer_reviews.text: my cat liked it. I did add fish oil to her dish every meal though because I found this food to be slightly lacking in vitamins and minerals. I upgraded to a better food but it is double the price, so if youre on a budget but still want to feed your pets something msotly healthy and nutritious this is the product to try. also doesn't have a weird meat smell like some cat foods do
customer_reviews.author: Lybi

customer_reviews.title: My cat really seems to like it, I had to put this in a ...
customer_reviews.text: My cat really seems to like it, I had to put this in a container as she kept hopping into the bag and trying to eat it whenever. Every time she hears me open the container she comes running over and shoves her face in it. This is a great value and I will continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mica Rue

customer_reviews.title: Stock up. Your roommate's cat will steal it.
customer_reviews.text: Not a lot to say here. My cat loves it. Even more telling is my roommate's cat, Bella, comes all the way to the basement to raid Floyd's food bowl when she discovered it. Now my roommate buys it.
customer_reviews.author: Feeder of Floyd

customer_reviews.title: My babies love this
customer_reviews.text: My cats are both adopted (separately) and were Ill when I got then due to feline leukemia and poor nutrition. This is all that they eat now, they love their food, the vet and everyone says they look great and they're softer than ever!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Cat Loves This Formulation
customer_reviews.text: Seems to make the cat happy. A happy cat is a happy cat owner. Quality specifications appear to be as good as anything else out there. Price is fair. I expect by again.
customer_reviews.author: Blueflippy

customer_reviews.title: Much larger of a bag than expected!
customer_reviews.text: A much bigger bag arrived than I expected! Never again will I buy cat food at the grocery store where I would've been given half the amount of food for the same price as this Amazon listing. My cat loves it too! Will buy again when I eventually run out. Which could be months for just one cat!
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this! Their coat is shiny and they have good digestion eating this. Would recommend, ships fast & last about 3 weeks feeding my 2 adult cats.
customer_reviews.author: Delia Ross (Poe Eternal)

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Cat Food
customer_reviews.text: My rescued feral cat loves this stuff - won't eat anything else. She's getting fat and happy on it. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Martyw

customer_reviews.title: cats love this food
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Purina's Indoor formula for years. It was recommended to me by my vet as her top choice of food in the mid-range price category (as opposed to the really expensive brands.)
customer_reviews.author: esp

customer_reviews.title: My cats seem to like it pretty well and I have one VERY picky ...
customer_reviews.text: A very affordable food. My cats seem to like it pretty well and I have one VERY picky eater. It's probably not the "best" food on the market, but it gets the job done and my vet doesn't have a problem with keeping my cats on it.
customer_reviews.author: Rm1985

customer_reviews.title: No more vomiting!
customer_reviews.text: My two cats love this food. My kitten always had vomiting issues with other foods, until I switched to this. Amazon sells it at a great price too -- the 13lb bag lasts me several months!
customer_reviews.author: kittymama

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: My picky eaters love this cat food. In fact, so does the dog who keeps sneaking nibbles LOL. I like the fact that it is natural and is good value for the price. Will continue to purchase for my fur babies.
customer_reviews.author: Dora's Daughter

customer_reviews.title: My cats love this food!
customer_reviews.text: I've been trying all different types of cat food for my picky eaters that tend to throw up their food at times. My cats seem to be liking this cat food & it also seems to be helping with their tummy issues. Will be purchasing again!
customer_reviews.author: Nadine Hadel

customer_reviews.title: Happy healthy kitties who love their food
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this food and are incredibly healthy since I switched to it.. several years ago when it first came out. Both of my feline family members are incredibly fussy and will even turn down tasty treats.. but they rush to their bowls as soon as they hear their food being poured.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: Cats love the taste!
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this and it's about the only dry cat food they will eat. It's pretty hard to find in stores at time for a good price so we often buy it on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Chardonnay Adams

customer_reviews.title: My cats can't wait for me to get the bag out of the box!
customer_reviews.text: Our cats hardly wait for us to pull this out of the box we order it in from Amazon, so definitely a plus considering they have become picky eaters in their older age!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica B

customer_reviews.title: My cats love this stuff,
customer_reviews.text: Glad they have the large size. They are glutinous gangsters. I wanted healthy food for them. I like the convenience of home delivery as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mad LuvTop Contributor: Jewelry Making

customer_reviews.title: Best cat food I have bought for my fur babies so far
customer_reviews.text: I have stuck by this specific formula for a couple of years now. From all of the brands that promise to have quality ingredients for the best value this has been the winner. My cats love it and it has kept my cats pretty lean
customer_reviews.author: Fergie Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: My cat eats this like he’s never seen food before (which trust me he’s extremely well fed) so I would guess it’s a 5 star on flavor hahaha but same price as the store just nice to have it delivered to my house haha
customer_reviews.author: Tiffanie

customer_reviews.title: Cat Approved
customer_reviews.text: I got this food primarily for both my cats sensitive stomachs as well for one of my cats weight issues. He is literally a pig. So even eating more of this he has leaned down to a better weight. So I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Magnus Whiteraven

customer_reviews.title: Not healthy!! Your cat will become obese quickly!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed in this food and am now stuck with 3 unopened bags because I didn’t start using it until after the return window closed. I put my 4 cats on this food and within 4 days they had noticeably gained a lot of weight. Even though this is an indoor cat food it obviously does not help regulate weight. My cats are not indoor and are much more active than an average indoor cat. If they gained weight like they did so suddenly, I can’t even imagine how horribly unhealthy this is for an actual indoor cat.
customer_reviews.author: Michael H. Albee\Jean Albee

customer_reviews.title: Highly approved by all our cats.
customer_reviews.text: All our cats will choose this particular dry food over another product from this same company that they had enjoyed for years. They ( the cats) have spoken so I will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hayes Hodo

customer_reviews.title: ... from the $40 a bag brand to this was amazing. No cats puking
customer_reviews.text: The transition from the $40 a bag brand to this was amazing. No cats puking, no pooping issues. It is so good and I wish I found it sooner. It's $19.99 at our local big chain pet store and such a deal here
customer_reviews.author: Gym rat

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Cat Food, Cheaper Than The Store
customer_reviews.text: I've bought Purina Naturals Indoor ever since a buddy recommended it after the pricier Blue Buffalo cat food gave my cat bloody, loose stools. Purina Naturals is great quality cat food, and this particular size/price means that I can order it on Amazon for way cheaper than I can get it in the store. I've used this exact food for over a year now and my two adult cats still go nuts every time I get out the food scoop.
customer_reviews.author: Kait K.

customer_reviews.title: $11 is an amazing deal for this
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my cat and hedgehogs and I have no idea how to rate the scent and taste lol. But I will say it gets eaten, doesn't get thrown up, and the $11 price is amazing for a 14lb bag. As long as it stays that cheap, I will be ordering a LOT.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Martin

customer_reviews.title: My cat liked it. I didn't like how strong the smell ...
customer_reviews.text: Will last a long time. My cat liked it. I didn't like how strong the smell was but it's my cats opinion that matters
customer_reviews.author: regp

customer_reviews.title: Purina Naturals.
customer_reviews.text: Again I say 16 paws up. I do not feed this as a primary to my cats, this is a supplement or a treat if you would to the food they are currently eating (transitioning from EVO to Fussie cat as EVO is defunct) as a treat. I find they all like it for a change of pace and it does not upset my Maine Coon mix's tummy. Yes, its Purina but mine are okay with it.
customer_reviews.author: L. M.M

customer_reviews.title: My many cats love it
customer_reviews.text: Well, I don't love it, but all my cats do. They seem to prefer this to the pricier brands. (I've tried them all.) .So I guess if they love it, so do I.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great food for my cats as have 4
customer_reviews.text: Great food for my cats as have 4. Great diet for them and I have it on my subscribe and save and shipped every month. It is made for fur ball probs!
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: MY CATS LOVE THIS FOOD! WHAT A RELIEF
customer_reviews.text: I bought every flavor and brand seaching for the perfect hard foot that my cats will eat consistently. Well, this is it! When I put this down, I am sure tha the bowl will be empty by the end of the day. So this is the only hard food that I buy for them now. Life is easy.
customer_reviews.author: P.B.

customer_reviews.title: So convenient
customer_reviews.text: I can't get the 13 pound bag anywhere except here at Amazon. It's so easy to just click and wait for delivery. I might mention that I have COPD and can't manage heavy things so right on the front porch is GREAT! My cars won't eat any other cat food.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Matthews

customer_reviews.title: i have a cat that cannot tolerate dyes and other ...
customer_reviews.text: i have a cat that cannot tolerate dyes and other additives. She can digest this food well without getting sick I mix it with IAMS Original Cats do very well with this combo
customer_reviews.author: dee M

customer_reviews.title: For the win!
customer_reviews.text: Always a great value and the cats love it. I have used this with our previous 12 year old cat and since my 2 year old cats were old enough for cat food. Very happy with quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: Katlyn

customer_reviews.title: My cat has food allergies and usually has a bad skin reaction
customer_reviews.text: My cat has food allergies. Surprisingly, he can eat this grocery store brand. He likes it too. My cat has food allergies and usually has a bad skin reaction. Raw patches that he scratches that ooze usually on his front arms and chest. However, he is fine with this food.
customer_reviews.author: Ver

customer_reviews.title: Healthier food option for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: My cats enjoy this and I like that the ingredients are healthier for a great price. Subscribe and Save makes it so easy and it is cheaper and more convenient that having to make a trip to the store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves this.
customer_reviews.text: I have a very fat cat who LOVES his food. I ordered this and added the subscription to it and he absolutely loves it. It is a very big bag.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Cats LOVE it!!
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this food. This is now the only kind they get. Their fur is absolutely beautiful and they are big and robust. Switched from a food that had dyes in it because they kept puking. No puking at all on this food!!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy L. Hanberg

customer_reviews.title: My cats' favorite at the best price.
customer_reviews.text: This is my cats' favorite food and the best price I can find it. I tried switching food to give them something different and one of my cats stopped eating. I had to switch back and definitely wouldn't try anything else again.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Camardo

customer_reviews.title: He likes it
customer_reviews.text: My cat does like this food but I do not understand he eats a lot this food and vomit. I can not understand what he did and he drink a lot of water anyway he eats a lot and drinks water a lot
customer_reviews.author: johnk

customer_reviews.title: Changed?!
customer_reviews.text: I think they changed this product. It no longer looks the same. I have been feeding my cat this exact type of food for years, and all of a sudden it looks different and he has diarrhea.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Fresh
customer_reviews.text: Its a known cat food. It was well in sell by date and it was a good price delivered. What's not to like? Unfortunately, the lowest Amazon price has increased so it makes more sense to buy it local now. However, thats not the products fault.
customer_reviews.author: LetsGo

customer_reviews.title: That my cat loved it!
customer_reviews.text: My “Papi” loves it! So, it’s good enough for me!
customer_reviews.author: josie magers

customer_reviews.title: Happy Cat
customer_reviews.text: My cat will not eat anything but Cat Naturals, so she's happy. The price on the large bag is better than I can get locally, so I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: Zippity

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this cat food/ guarantee your cats will love them.
customer_reviews.text: My cats love them. I think the crunch is terrific and must taste good for them. They have been eating them for about two years now. Packing is also good.
customer_reviews.author: Fema

customer_reviews.title: Seem fine
customer_reviews.text: My cats favorite. He likes it and doesn't vomit like some cheaper dry foods cause him. Very convenient to have it delivered, even though the price is comparable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My cats love this brand of Purina Cat Chow/Naturals
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this brand of Purina Cat Chow/Naturals. My 10 year old likes brand more than any other. My 6 year old doesn't much care as long as he eats. Hope it never changes or I'll be in trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Gadget Queen

customer_reviews.title: Good price and very healthy doesn’t have all the bad stuff in it.
customer_reviews.text: Great price and my cats really love it. Very healthy for them. Doesn’t have all the products that aren’t good for your cats which I really love about it.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Jean Hoemberg

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cats like having it in the rotation ...when budget is tight it's the least bad of the cheap ones.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Was decent.
customer_reviews.text: We've been using the cat food for over a year now then all of my cats started barfing after eating so switched to another brand for a while. Not sure what is going on as the aren't throwing up with the new brand. IDK? I do like their rewards program though.:)
customer_reviews.author: Homeheart

customer_reviews.title: Saving A Buck
customer_reviews.text: We only have one cat. We use two smaller bags to split the large bag and seal one airtight so it is fresh when the first bag is used up. This saves a couple of bucks but takes some space.
customer_reviews.author: Rick  R.

customer_reviews.title: My outdoor cat eats it and is happy. Can't feed it to my indoor cat because ...
customer_reviews.text: My outdoor cat eats it and is happy. Can't feed it to my indoor cat because she has terribly sensitive digestive system.
customer_reviews.author: BENGAL

customer_reviews.title: Both my "senior" cat (10y/d) and younger cat (2y/o) love It! Recently I noticed that my older cat ...
customer_reviews.text: Both my "senior" cat (10y/d) and younger cat (2y/o) love It! Recently I noticed that my older cat gained some weight, so I switched from the Purina Cat Chow Naturals ORIGINAL to the Purina Cat Chow Naturals INDOOR. My cats couldn't even tell the difference and love it just the same and my older cat lost the excess weight too (I did not change anything but the food!!!). Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: MJC8

product_meta.title: Purina Cat Chow Naturals Indoor with Real Chicken & Turkey Adult Dry Cat Food
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Chicken & Turkey| Size:13 lb. BagServe Purina Cat Chow Naturals Indoor Plus Vitamins & Minerals adult dry cat food to your indoor cat, and provide natural nutrition with added essential vitamins and minerals designed to meet her unique needs. Featuring real chicken as the #1 ingredient, this recipe also contains real turkey for a blend of enticing poultry flavors. Crafted without artificial flavors or preservatives, this wholesome Purina Cat Chow recipe gives you peace of mind every time you fill her dish. Natural fiber in every serving helps to control hairballs, and the special formulation promotes a healthy weight. Watch as she comes running when she hears the sound of the kibble hitting her dish. She gets a great taste and crunchy texture to satisfy her taste buds, and you get the comfort that comes from giving your cat companion a premium meal to help support her healthy, happy life with you.
feature_bullets: One (1) 13 lb. Bag - Purina Cat Chow Hairball, Healthy Weight, Indoor, Natural Dry Cat Food, Naturals Indoor
Made with real chicken as the #1 ingredient
Made without added artificial flavors or preservatives
Features a natural fiber blend to help control hairballs
One (1) 13 Pound Bag of Purina Cat Chow Naturals Indoor Plus Vitamins and Minerals
Natural Fiber Blend Helps Control Hairballs
Helps Promote Healthy Weight and omega-6 for healthy skin & shiny coat
No Added Artificial Flavors or Preservatives
Made with Real Chicken and Turkey
100% Complete & Balanced Formula for Adult Cats
